variants.text: Interested in attending? Simply reply to this email and I'll reserve your complimentary press pass.

If you're interested in attending and potentially covering the event, please let me know and I'll:
- Reserve your complimentary press pass
- Send you the press kit with event details and visuals
- Arrange any interviews you'd like to conduct

Just reply to this email to confirm!

To claim your free press pass, simply reply confirming:
1. You'll attend the event on {{event_date}}
2. You'll share a mention (social media post, article, or newsletter feature)

Once confirmed, I'll send over all the details and materials you'll need.

Interested? Reply to this email and let me know what kind of coverage you're thinking - whether it's a social media shoutout, a brief mention in your newsletter, or a full article. We're flexible and happy to work with whatever fits your editorial calendar!

Press passes are limited, so please RSVP by {{rsvp_deadline}} if you're interested. Simply reply to confirm and I'll send over your pass and the full press kit.

Looking forward to seeing you there!
